message: if you are staying in the hotel rooms, access will cost $10/day or something like that
that sucks, but is how the contract negotiation turned and is a series of tradeoffs
Internet connectivity is like needing air. :) In the hotel, will the internet access be free?
wifi in the lobby is free
wifi should be available in all of the conference rooms for free as well
if it is not working somewhere, please post here, or twitter, or the reg desk and we will have someone look into it
fwiw, wifi is free in my room
